title: BitcoinExchangeIndia.com
author: BitcoinExchangeIndia.com
content: So, I had this domain BitcoinExchangeIndia.com, sitting idle for long. Thought of putting it up for some use. Currently, it is showing...1. Bitcoin Exchange Rate in India against INR.2. Bitcoin price in INR on this day.Let me know if it is useful and feel free to suggest improvement.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinExchangeIndia.com on September 10, 2022, 06:08:01 PMSo, I had this domain BitcoinExchangeIndia.com, sitting idle for long. Thought of putting it up for some use. Currently, it is showing...1. Bitcoin Exchange Rate in India against INR.2. Bitcoin price in INR on this day.Let me know if it is useful and feel free to suggest improvement.You have a great domain name and apart from just showing the INR value of Bitcoin, I would like to suggest that you can also use it to compare the selling price of Bitcoin showing up on different exchanges. This would help visitors to determine which exchange is providing good INR value. The same can be done for the buying price of Bitcoin in these exchanges.

comments.author: pawanjain
comments.body: Apart from the exchange price, you can also add a services section and display a list of services provided by other merchants.For example some offer mobile recharge via BTC and some offer buying domains via BTC etc...You will have to dig up the internet and compile a list out of it which is indeed a time consuming job.
